example.parse: (VP (PRT (JUS_PART ل)) (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:J نقف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-MNR (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC معا)) (NP-MNR (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC يدا) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC واحدة)) (SBAR (WHNP-3 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (NOUN.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC مواجهة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_ACC كل) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-4 (REL_PRON من)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يدعو) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-4)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN دعوة) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN جاهلية)))) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN حرب) (CONJ او) (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN تفكيك) (CONJ او) (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN انقسام))))))))))))) (PUNC ,)

arg.g: whoever call upon the ignorance invitation to war or to dismantling or splitting

example.arg: كل من يدعو بدعوة جاهلية الى حرب او تفكيك او انقسام
